metadata.subject: Poll: Trump closing in on Clinton

relationships.description: Richard Kahn is sending political polling information to Jeffrey Epstein

analysis.purpose: To share political polling information showing Trump gaining ground on Clinton
analysis.significance: Shows communication about political developments between Richard Kahn and Jeffrey Epstein during the 2016 presidential campaign

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found

illegal_activity.description: Email contains a link to a news article about political polling, no first-hand illegal activity

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be sharing publicly available polling data from The Hill during the 2016 presidential campaign

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein a link to a Hill article showing Donald Trump gaining ground on Hillary Clinton in presidential polling during the 2016 campaign.
